Summary: A Disc-Liked Silver Object hover over the sky of M
divs: Sighting DetailsI was on my way for lunch about 11:30 today, and I was noticed by a SiverDisc-Liked Object in the Sky. I was noticed because it is reflected by the sun.It moves like a fallen-leaf, and it hovered over the sky of Manhattan for about15 minutes. Then it disappeared in the colud. The object is lower than thecommercial air-line because when I saw it, I also saw the airplane.
